content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 17 Mar 2019How to subscribe to your preferential offerings?Im vested in Keppel Infra Trust, lately there's a preferential offering "The preferential offering will open on March 27, 2019 at 9am, with entitled unitholders able to accept and apply for excess preferential offering units up till April 4, 2019. These units are expected to begin trading on April 15, 2019 at 9am."How do i subscribe to my share of pref. offering, how would the company notify the unitholders?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 18 Mar 2019You should receive an official notice stating how many units you are entitled to subscribe to.Then the notice will also state the methods you can use to apply, usually is through ATM/ibanking or cashier's order.Since the preferential offering opens on March 27th, you should receive the notice after that. Probably 1-2 days for snail mail to arrive.1 comment0
